00033 #define MATRIX_GET_CHAR_2D(bp,info,plane,x,y) \
00034         (*(((uchar *)(bp))+(plane)+((info)->dimstride[0]*(x))+((info)->dimstride[1]*(y))))
00035 
00036 #define MATRIX_GET_LONG_2D(bp,info,plane,x,y) \
00037         (*(long *)(((uchar *)(bp))+(plane*4)+((info)->dimstride[0]*(x))+((info)->dimstride[1]*(y))))
00038 
00039 #define MATRIX_GET_FLOAT32_2D(bp,info,plane,x,y) \
00040         (*(float *)(((uchar *)(bp))+(plane*4)+((info)->dimstride[0]*(x))+((info)->dimstride[1]*(y))))
00041 
00042 #define MATRIX_GET_FLOAT64_2D(bp,info,plane,x,y) \
00043         (*(double *)(((uchar *)(bp))+(plane*8)+((info)->dimstride[0]*(x))+((info)->dimstride[1]*(y))))
00044 
00045 #define MATRIX_SET_CHAR_2D(bp,info,plane,x,y,val) \
00046         (*(((uchar *)(bp))+(plane)+((info)->dimstride[0]*(x))+((info)->dimstride[1]*(y)))=(val))
00047 
00048 #define MATRIX_SET_LONG_2D(bp,info,plane,x,y,val) \
00049         (*(long *)(((uchar *)(bp))+(plane*4)+((info)->dimstride[0]*(x))+((info)->dimstride[1]*(y)))=(val))
00050 
00051 #define MATRIX_SET_FLOAT32_2D(bp,info,plane,x,y,val) \
00052         (*(float *)(((uchar *)(bp))+(plane*4)+((info)->dimstride[0]*(x))+((info)->dimstride[1]*(y)))=(val))
00053 
00054 #define MATRIX_SET_FLOAT64_2D(bp,info,plane,x,y,val) \
00055         (*(double *)(((uchar *)(bp))+(plane*8)+((info)->dimstride[0]*(x))+((info)->dimstride[1]*(y)))=(val))
00056 
00057 #ifdef WIN_VERSION
00058 #ifdef __GNUC__
00059  void init_jit_symbols(void)
00060  {
00061          _jit_sym_register = gensym("register");
00062          _jit_sym_char = gensym("char");
00063          _jit_sym_long = gensym("long");
00064          _jit_sym_float32 = gensym("float32");
00065          _jit_sym_float64 = gensym("float64");
00066          _jit_sym_list = gensym("list");
00067          _jit_sym_jit_matrix = gensym("jit_matrix");
00068          _jit_sym_class_jit_matrix = gensym("class_jit_matrix");
00069          _jit_sym_lock = gensym("lock");
00070          _jit_sym_setinfo = gensym("setinfo");
00071          _jit_sym_getinfo = gensym("getinfo");
00072          _jit_sym_getdata = gensym("getdata");
00073          _jit_sym_clear = gensym("clear");
00074          _jit_sym_err_calculate = gensym("err_calculate");
00075  }
00076 #endif //__GNUC__

00079 typedef struct _jit_sum 
00080 {
00081         t_object                        ob;
00082         void                            *obex;
00083         void                            *valout;
00084         char                            mode;                   // mode 0: normal operation, mode 1: change notification
00085         void                            *matrix;                // pointer to the internal matrix used in change detection
00086         t_symbol                        *matrix_name;   // name of the internal matrix
00087 } t_jit_sum;
00088 
00089 
00090 void *jit_sum_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00091 void jit_sum_free(t_jit_sum *x);
00092 void jit_sum_assist(t_jit_sum *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00093 void jit_sum_jit_matrix(t_jit_sum *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00094 void jit_sum_calculate_ndim(t_jit_sum *x,       long dimcount, long *dim, t_atom *a_coord, t_jit_matrix_info *in_minfo, char *bip);
00095 void jit_sum_change_calculate_ndim(t_jit_sum *x, t_jit_matrix_info *in_minfo, char *in_mdata);

00097 
00098 // Globals
00099 t_class         *jit_sum_class;
00100 t_symbol        *ps_done;
00101                         
00102 
00103 /**************************************************************************************/
00104 // MAIN
00105 
00106 int main(void)
00107 {       
00108         long attrflags = 0;
00109         t_class *c;
00110         t_object *attr;
00111         
00112         jamoma_init();
00113 #ifdef WIN_VERSION 
00114 #ifdef __GNUC__
00115         init_jit_symbols();
00116 #endif
00117 #endif
00118 
00119         c = class_new("tap.jit.sum", (method)jit_sum_new, (method)jit_sum_free, (short)sizeof(t_jit_sum), 
00120                 (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00121         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_jit_sum, obex));
00122 
00123     class_addmethod(c, (method)jit_sum_jit_matrix,      "jit_matrix", A_GIMME, 0L);             //at beginning of messlist for speed
00124     class_addmethod(c, (method)jit_sum_assist,          "assist", A_CANT, 0L); 
00125         
00126         // ATTRIBUTE: mode
00127         attr = attr_offset_new("mode", _sym_char, attrflags,
00128                 (method)0, (method)0L, calcoffset(t_jit_sum, mode));
00129         class_addattr(c, attr); 
00130 
00131         // this is very important!
00132     class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00133     jit_sum_class = c;
00134     
00135     ps_done = gensym("done");
00136     return 0;
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 /**************************************************************************************/
00141 // OBJECT LIFE
00142 
00143 void *jit_sum_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00144 {
00145         t_jit_sum                       *x;
00146         void                            *m;             // pointer to a matrix (used for output)
00147         t_jit_matrix_info       info;   // matrix info parameters to set for out matrix
00148 
00149         x = (t_jit_sum *)object_alloc(jit_sum_class);
00150         if(x){
00151                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x,NULL));       // dumpout
00152                 x->valout       = outlet_new(x,0L);
00153                 x->mode = 0;
00154                 attr_args_process(x,argc,argv); //handle attribute args 
00155                 
00156                 // Set up a matrix for writing to...
00157                 x->matrix_name = jit_symbol_unique();
00158                 jit_matrix_info_default(&info);                                                                 // Follow this up with any values I want to set...
00159                 m = jit_object_new(_jit_sym_jit_matrix, &info);                                 // Create new jitter(matrix) object
00160                 m = jit_object_method(m, _jit_sym_register, x->matrix_name);    // Register the matrix object
00161                 if(!m) error("tap.jit.sum: couldn't allocate/register matrix");
00162                 jit_object_method(m, _jit_sym_clear);                                                   // Clear the matrix contents
00163                 jit_object_attach(x->matrix_name, x);                                                   // Attach this Max object to the registered Jitter object
00164                 x->matrix = m;                                                                                                  // Store the pointer in our object's struct
00165         }
00166         return (x);
00167 }
00168 
00169 // FREE MEMORY  
00170 void jit_sum_free(t_jit_sum *x)
00171 {
00172         jit_object_detach(x->matrix_name, x);
00173         jit_object_free(x->matrix);
00174 }

00180 
00181 // ASSISTANCE STRINGS
00182 void jit_sum_assist(t_jit_sum *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00183 {
00184         if (m == 1) { //input
00185                 sprintf(s,"(matrix) in");
00186         } else { //output
00187                 switch (a) {
00188                 case 0:
00189                         sprintf(s,"(int) sum of values");
00190                         break;                  
00191                 case 1:
00192                         sprintf(s,"dumpout");
00193                         break;                  
00194                 }
00195         }
00196 }
00197 
00198 
00199 void jit_sum_jit_matrix(t_jit_sum *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00200 {
00201         void *matrix;
00202         long i,dimcount,dim[JIT_MATRIX_MAX_DIMCOUNT];
00203         long in_savelock;
00204         t_jit_matrix_info in_minfo;
00205         char *in_mdata;
00206         t_atom a_coord[JIT_MATRIX_MAX_DIMCOUNT];
00207         
00208         if (argc&&argv) {
00209                 //find matrix
00210                 matrix = jit_object_findregistered(jit_atom_getsym(argv));
00211                 if (matrix&&jit_object_method(matrix, _jit_sym_class_jit_matrix)) {
00212                         //calculate
00213                         in_savelock = (long) jit_object_method(matrix,_jit_sym_lock,1);
00214                         jit_object_method(matrix, _jit_sym_getinfo, &in_minfo);
00215                         jit_object_method(matrix, _jit_sym_getdata, &in_mdata);
00216                         
00217                         if(!in_mdata) { 
00218                                 jit_error_sym(x, _jit_sym_err_calculate);
00219                                 jit_object_method(matrix, _jit_sym_lock, in_savelock);
00220                                 goto out;
00221                         }
00222                         
00223                         //get dimensions/planecount 
00224                         dimcount = in_minfo.dimcount;
00225                         for (i=0;i<dimcount;i++) {
00226                                 dim[i] = in_minfo.dim[i];
00227                         }               
00228                         
00229                         //calculate
00230                         if(x->mode == 0)        // default
00231                                 jit_sum_calculate_ndim(x, dimcount, dim, a_coord, &in_minfo, in_mdata);         
00232                         else                            // change flag
00233                                 jit_sum_change_calculate_ndim(x, &in_minfo, in_mdata);          
00234 
00235                         
00236                         jit_object_method(matrix, _jit_sym_lock, in_savelock);                          
00237                         max_jit_obex_dumpout(x, ps_done, 0, 0L);                        
00238                 } else {
00239                         jit_error_sym(x,_jit_sym_err_calculate);
00240                 }
00241         }
00242 out:
00243         return;
00244 }
00245 
00246 
00247 
00248 //recursive function to handle higher dimension matrices, by processing 2D sections at a time 
00249 void jit_sum_calculate_ndim(t_jit_sum *x, long dimcount, long *dim, t_atom *a_coord, t_jit_matrix_info *in_minfo, char *bip)
00250 {
00251         t_atom a_val[JIT_MATRIX_MAX_PLANECOUNT];
00252         long i,j,k,n;
00253         long rowstride;
00254         uchar *ip;
00255         double  mySum, myRowAccum, myColAccum;
00256         double  myDivisor;      
00257         t_atom my_val[3];
00258         
00259         mySum = 0;
00260         myColAccum = 0;
00261         myRowAccum = 0;
00262         
00263         if (dimcount<1) return; //safety
00264         
00265         switch(dimcount) {
00266         case 1:
00267                 dim[1] = 1;
00268         case 2:
00269                 n = dim[0];
00270                 switch(x->mode) {
00271                 case 1:
00272                         if (in_minfo->type==_jit_sym_char) {
00273                                 post("I am A");
00274                                 rowstride = in_minfo->dimstride[1];
00275                                 for (j=0;j<dim[0];j++) {
00276                                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + j * in_minfo->dimstride[0]);       
00277                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[0]),j);      
00278                                         for (i=0;i<dim[1];i++){
00279                                                 jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[1]),i);
00280                                                 for (k=0;k<in_minfo->planecount;k++) {
00281                                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_val[k]),(((uchar *)ip)[k]) + mySum);
00282                                                 }
00283 
00284                                                 // BECAUSE THEY WANTED TO MAKE LISTS FOR MULTIPLANE (UNLIKE ME)
00285                                                 //if (in_minfo->planecount>1)   
00286                                                 //      outlet_anything(x->valout,_jit_sym_list,in_minfo->planecount,a_val);
00287                                                 //else 
00288                                                 
00289                                                         outlet_int(x->valout,a_val[0].a_w.w_long);
00290                                                 ip += rowstride;
00291                                         }
00292                                 }
00293                         } else if (in_minfo->type==_jit_sym_long) {
00294                                 rowstride = in_minfo->dimstride[1];// >> 2L;
00295                                 for (j=0;j<dim[0];j++){
00296                                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + j * in_minfo->dimstride[0]);                                       
00297                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[0]),j);      
00298                                         for (i=0;i<dim[1];i++) {        
00299                                                 jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[1]),i);      
00300                                                 for (k=0;k<in_minfo->planecount;k++) {
00301                                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_val[k]),((long *)ip)[k]);
00302                                                 }
00303 
00304                                                 if (in_minfo->planecount>1)     
00305                                                         outlet_anything(x->valout,_jit_sym_list,in_minfo->planecount,a_val);
00306                                                 else 
00307                                                         outlet_int(x->valout,a_val[0].a_w.w_long);
00308                                                 ip += rowstride;
00309                                         }
00310                                 }
00311                         } else if (in_minfo->type==_jit_sym_float32) {
00312                                 rowstride = in_minfo->dimstride[1];// >> 2L;
00313                                 for (j=0;j<dim[0];j++){
00314                                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + j * in_minfo->dimstride[0]);                                       
00315                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[0]),j);      
00316                                         for (i=0;i<dim[1];i++) {        
00317                                                 jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[1]),i);      
00318                                                 for (k=0;k<in_minfo->planecount;k++) {
00319                                                         jit_atom_setfloat(&(a_val[k]),((float *)ip)[k]);
00320                                                 }
00321 
00322                                                 if (in_minfo->planecount>1)     
00323                                                         outlet_anything(x->valout,_jit_sym_list,in_minfo->planecount,a_val);
00324                                                 else 
00325                                                         outlet_float(x->valout,a_val[0].a_w.w_float);
00326                                                 ip += rowstride;
00327                                         }
00328                                 }
00329                         } else if (in_minfo->type==_jit_sym_float64) {
00330                                 rowstride = in_minfo->dimstride[1];// >> 3L;
00331                                 for (j=0;j<dim[0];j++){
00332                                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + j * in_minfo->dimstride[0]);                                       
00333                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[0]),j);      
00334                                         for (i=0;i<dim[1];i++) {        
00335                                                 jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[1]),i);      
00336                                                 for (k=0;k<in_minfo->planecount;k++) {
00337                                                         jit_atom_setfloat(&(a_val[k]),((double *)ip)[k]);
00338                                                 }
00339 
00340                                                 if (in_minfo->planecount>1)     
00341                                                         outlet_anything(x->valout,_jit_sym_list,in_minfo->planecount,a_val);
00342                                                 else 
00343                                                         outlet_float(x->valout,a_val[0].a_w.w_float);
00344                                                 ip += rowstride;
00345                                         }
00346                                 }
00347                         } 
00348                         break;
00349                 case 0:                                         // THIS IS THE PART OF THE CODE THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
00350                                                                         // FOR SOME REASON IT ONLY WORKS WITH UNIPLANE DATA
00351                 default:
00352                         if (in_minfo->type==_jit_sym_char) {
00353                                 myDivisor = /*255 **/ dim[0] * dim[1] * in_minfo->planecount;
00354                                 for (i=0;i<dim[1];i++){                                         // Y loop
00355                                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + i*in_minfo->dimstride[1]);                                 
00356                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[1]),i);      
00357                                         for (j=0;j<dim[0];j++) {                                // X loop (nested)
00358                                                 jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[0]),j);      
00359                                                 for (k=0;k<in_minfo->planecount;k++) {   // PLANE loop (double-nested)
00360                                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_val[k]),((uchar *)ip)[(j*in_minfo->planecount)+k]);
00361                                                         if(a_val[0].a_w.w_long != 0){
00362                                                                 mySum++;        // Increment the sum
00363                                                                 myRowAccum += a_coord[1].a_w.w_long;
00364                                                                 myColAccum += a_coord[0].a_w.w_long;
00365                                                         }               
00366                                                 }
00367                                         }
00368                                 }
00369                                 
00370                                 if(mySum != 0){
00371                                         myRowAccum = myRowAccum / mySum;        
00372                                         myColAccum = myColAccum / mySum;
00373                                 }       
00374                                 
00375                                 jit_atom_setsym(&(my_val[0]),gensym("quantity"));                                       
00376                                 jit_atom_setfloat(&(my_val[1]),mySum/myDivisor);
00377                                 outlet_list(x->valout, 0L, 2, (atom *)&my_val);
00378                                 
00379                                 jit_atom_setsym(&(my_val[0]),gensym("location"));                                                               
00380                                 jit_atom_setfloat(&(my_val[1]),myColAccum/dim[0]);
00381                                 jit_atom_setfloat(&(my_val[2]),myRowAccum/dim[1]);
00382                                 outlet_list(x->valout, 0L, 3, (atom *)&my_val);
00383 
00384                                 
00385                                 
00386                                 
00387                                 
00388                                 
00389                         } else if (in_minfo->type==_jit_sym_long) {
00390                                 for (i=0;i<dim[1];i++){
00391                                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + i*in_minfo->dimstride[1]);                                 
00392                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[1]),i);      
00393                                         for (j=0;j<dim[0];j++) {        
00394                                                 jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[0]),j);      
00395                                                 for (k=0;k<in_minfo->planecount;k++) {
00396                                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_val[k]),((long *)ip)[(j*in_minfo->planecount)+k]);
00397                                                 }
00398 
00399                                                 if (in_minfo->planecount>1)     
00400                                                         outlet_anything(x->valout,_jit_sym_list,in_minfo->planecount,a_val);
00401                                                 else 
00402                                                         outlet_int(x->valout,a_val[0].a_w.w_long);
00403                                         }
00404                                 }
00405                         } else if (in_minfo->type==_jit_sym_float32) {
00406                                 for (i=0;i<dim[1];i++){
00407                                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + i*in_minfo->dimstride[1]);                                 
00408                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[1]),i);      
00409                                         for (j=0;j<dim[0];j++) {        
00410                                                 jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[0]),j);      
00411                                                 for (k=0;k<in_minfo->planecount;k++) {
00412                                                         jit_atom_setfloat(&(a_val[k]),((float *)ip)[(j*in_minfo->planecount)+k]);
00413                                                 }
00414 
00415                                                 if (in_minfo->planecount>1)     
00416                                                         outlet_anything(x->valout,_jit_sym_list,in_minfo->planecount,a_val);
00417                                                 else 
00418                                                         outlet_float(x->valout,a_val[0].a_w.w_float);
00419                                         }
00420                                 }
00421                         } else if (in_minfo->type==_jit_sym_float64) {
00422                                 for (i=0;i<dim[1];i++){
00423                                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + i*in_minfo->dimstride[1]);                                 
00424                                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[1]),i);      
00425                                         for (j=0;j<dim[0];j++) {        
00426                                                 jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[0]),j);      
00427                                                 for (k=0;k<in_minfo->planecount;k++) {
00428                                                         jit_atom_setfloat(&(a_val[k]),((double *)ip)[(j*in_minfo->planecount)+k]);
00429                                                 }
00430 
00431                                                 if (in_minfo->planecount>1)     
00432                                                         outlet_anything(x->valout,_jit_sym_list,in_minfo->planecount,a_val);
00433                                                 else 
00434                                                         outlet_float(x->valout,a_val[0].a_w.w_float);
00435                                         }
00436                                 }
00437                         } 
00438                         break;
00439                 }
00440                 break;
00441         default:
00442                 post("I am C");
00443                 for     (i=0;i<dim[dimcount-1];i++) {
00444                         ip = (uchar *)(bip + i*in_minfo->dimstride[dimcount-1]);
00445                         jit_atom_setlong(&(a_coord[dimcount-1]),i);     
00446                         jit_sum_calculate_ndim(x,dimcount-1,dim,a_coord,in_minfo, (char *)ip);
00447                 }
00448         }
00449 }

00456 
00457 /************************************************************************
00458  * This function is basically duplicating the behavior of jit.change.
00459  * It is only here because Hipno required it without the extra dependency
00460  * on yet another Jitter object.  In our case, we are only really
00461  * concerned with 2D and 3D float32 matricies
00462  ************************************************************************/
00463 
00464 void jit_sum_change_calculate_ndim(t_jit_sum *x, t_jit_matrix_info *in_minfo, char *in_mdata)
00465 {
00466         long i, j, k;
00467         long dim_x = in_minfo->dim[0], dim_y = in_minfo->dim[1], dim_z = in_minfo->dim[2];
00468         
00469         if(in_minfo->planecount > 1){
00470                 error("tap.jit.sum in mode 1: cannot function on multi-plane matrices");
00471                 return;
00472         }
00473         
00474         if(in_minfo->type == _sym_float32){
00475                 float                           *cell_value_new, *cell_value_old;       // a pointer to the current cell value
00476                 void                            *old_matrix = x->matrix;                        // 
00477                 t_jit_matrix_info       old_minfo;                                                      // 
00478                 char                            *old_mdata;
00479                 bool                            flag_changed = false;                           // 'true' if there was a change 
00480                 long                            savelock;
00481                 
00482                 jit_object_method(old_matrix, _jit_sym_getinfo, &old_minfo);
00483                 savelock = (long) jit_object_method(old_matrix, _jit_sym_lock, 1);
00484         
00485                 // STEP 1: Compare info on the incoming matrix and our internal matrix
00486                 if(old_minfo.dimcount != in_minfo->dimcount) flag_changed = true;
00487                 if(old_minfo.dim[0] != dim_x) flag_changed = true;
00488                 if(old_minfo.dim[1] != dim_y) flag_changed = true;
00489                 if(old_minfo.dim[2] != dim_z) flag_changed = true;
00490                 
00491                 if(flag_changed) goto output;
00492                 
00493                 // Get the pointer to the internal matrix
00494                 jit_object_method(old_matrix, _jit_sym_getdata, &old_mdata);
00495                 
00496                 // Check for problems
00497                 if (!old_mdata){ 
00498                         jit_error_sym(x, _jit_sym_err_calculate);
00499                         jit_object_method(old_matrix, _jit_sym_lock, savelock);
00500                         goto bye;
00501                 }
00502 
00503                 
00504                 
00505                 
00506                 // STEP 2: Compare the contents of the imcoming matrix and our internal matrix
00507                 switch(in_minfo->dimcount){
00508                         case 1:
00509                                 dim_y = 1;
00510                                 // fall through the 2D case with (N x 1) sized matrix
00511                         case 2:
00512                                 for(i=0; i<dim_x; i++){
00513                                         for(j=0; j<dim_y; j++){
00514                                                 cell_value_new = (float *)(in_mdata + (i * in_minfo->dimstride[1]) + (j * in_minfo->dimstride[0]));
00515                                                 cell_value_old = (float *)(old_mdata + (i * old_minfo.dimstride[1]) + (j * old_minfo.dimstride[0]));
00516                                                 //post("cell value for %i %i is: %f",i ,j, *cell_value_new);
00517                                                 if(*cell_value_new != *cell_value_old) goto output;
00518                                         }
00519                                 }                       
00520                         break;
00521                         case 3:
00522                                 for(k=0; k<dim_z; k++){
00523                                         for(i=0; i<dim_x; i++){
00524                                                 for(j=0; j<dim_y; j++){
00525                                                         cell_value_new = (float *)(in_mdata + (i * in_minfo->dimstride[1]) + (j * in_minfo->dimstride[0]) + (k * in_minfo->dimstride[2]));
00526                                                         cell_value_old = (float *)(old_mdata + (i * old_minfo.dimstride[1]) + (j * old_minfo.dimstride[0]) + (k * old_minfo.dimstride[2]));
00527                                                         //post("cell value for %i %i %i is: %f",i ,j, k, *cell_value_new);
00528                                                         if(*cell_value_new != *cell_value_old) goto output;
00529                                                 }
00530                                         }
00531                                 }
00532                         break;
00533                         default:
00534                                 error("tap.jit.sum in mode 1: cannot currently function on matrices with more than 3 dimensions");
00535                                 return;
00536                 }
00537                 return;  // matrix did not change
00538                 
00539                 
00540                 // STEP 3: Store the incoming matrix in our internal matrix for future comparisons
00541 output:
00542                 //post("matrix changed!");
00543                 outlet_anything(x->valout, gensym("matrix_change"), 0, (t_atom *)NIL);
00544                 
00545                 // copy the input matrix into our internal matrix
00546                 old_minfo.dimcount = in_minfo->dimcount;
00547                 old_minfo.dim[0] = dim_x;
00548                 old_minfo.dim[1] = dim_y;
00549                 old_minfo.dim[2] = dim_z;
00550                 old_minfo.type=_jit_sym_float32;
00551                 old_minfo.planecount = 1;
00552                 jit_object_method(old_matrix, _jit_sym_setinfo, &old_minfo);
00553 
00554                 for(i=0; i<in_minfo->size; i++)
00555                         old_mdata[i] = *(in_mdata+i);
00556                 
00557                 jit_object_method(old_matrix, _jit_sym_lock, savelock);                                 
00558                 jit_object_method(old_matrix, _jit_sym_lock, savelock);                                 
00559         }
00560         
00561         else{
00562                 error("tap.jit.sum in mode 1: cannot function on non-float32 matrices");
00563                 return;         
00564         }
00565 bye:
00566         return; 
00567 }
00568 
00569 
00570
